sentences.en: ...an emergent nationalist movement.
sentences.cn: ...一次新兴民族主义运动。

sentences.en: ...an emergent state.
sentences.cn: ...一个新兴国家。

sentences.en: Be calm! So one can think straight in emergent situation.
sentences.cn: 保持冷静! 这样人才能在紧急状况中头脑清楚地思考对策.

sentences.en: Both types of swarms have an emergent being and their own agenda.
sentences.cn: 两种类型的群体都自然存在并生灭作息.

sentences.en: Chromogenic black - and - white photographic film is a new emergent type of black - and - white film.
sentences.cn: 黑白 染料胶片是继彩色胶片之后发展起来的一种新型黑白胶片品种.

sentences.en: Discovering these patterns is the key to emergent design.
sentences.cn: 发现这些模式是紧急设计的关键。

sentences.en: Emergent light is no longer continuous.
sentences.cn: 透过的光不再是连续的.

sentences.en: He works with the never entirely predictable, the emergent.
sentences.cn: 他与那些向来无法完全确定的东西 、 那些意外事件打交道.

sentences.en: Let's return to Ben to examine his emergent goals more thor - oughly.
sentences.cn: 让我们回头更全面地研究本的偶发目标.

sentences.en: Like most emergent phenomena, wear is liable to self - reinforce.
sentences.cn: 与多数自发现象相仿, 磨损有 自我 巩固的倾向.

sentences.en: Make Invoice and packing list and assist in solving emergent customs problems.
sentences.cn: 制作发票和装箱单并协助解决紧急关务问题.

sentences.en: Mobs breed a requisite measure of complexity for emergent entities.
sentences.cn: 群聚的个体孕育出必要的复杂性,足以产生突发事物.

sentences.en: Retrobulbar hematoma was suspected and emergent surgical and medical treatments were instituted.
sentences.cn: 病患因而病症缓解而出院,之后门诊追综未发现有后遗症.

sentences.en: Rooted hydrophytes, both emergent and submergent, are found in this zone.
sentences.cn: 该区域分布有有根的水生植物, 包括浮游植物和沉水植物.

sentences.en: The book has initiative , emergent novelty and collecting value.
sentences.cn: 具有开创性 、 新颖性和收藏价值.

sentences.en: The emergent hemostatic rate was higher than that of Pituitrin ( p < 0.05 ).
sentences.cn: 与垂体后叶素相比止血效果明显 ( p<0.05 ).

sentences.en: the emergent nations of the world
sentences.cn: 世界上新成立的国家

sentences.en: The general had a emergent meeting military strategy with his crew.
sentences.cn: 将军与幕僚召开紧急的战略会议.

sentences.en: The real trick in emergent design is discovering these patterns.
sentences.cn: 紧急设计的真正诀窍就是发现这些模式。

sentences.en: There once appeared some newly emergent industrial and commercial towns.
sentences.cn: 摘要历史上,在一些云南的盐矿产区兴起了一系列新兴的工商业市镇.

words.tran_cn: 紧急情况；突发事件；非常时刻
形成；浮现；显露（emerge的ing形式）；由…中脱出
紧急的；浮现的；意外的；自然发生的

trans.tran_cn: 紧急的，浮现的，突然出现的，自然发生的
trans.tran_en: An emergent country, political movement, or social group is one that is becoming powerful or coming into existence
